readable.title: 2512682478_b67cc525c7
readable.content: A boy pushing another boy on the swing . A little boy in a blue shirt and blue jeans is pushing the swing that a little boy in a red shirt and blue shorts is sitting in . One boy pushes another on a swing . one boy wearing a red shirt riding on a swing while another boy wearing a blue shirt pushing him . One young boy pushing another young boy on a swing .
